EXPRESSION: IF([Total VanArsdel Units]=0, 0, DIVIDE([Total VanArsdel Units], [Total Units], 0))
DIVIDE([Total VanArsdel Units YTD], [Total Units YTD])
CALCULATE([% Units Market Share YTD], SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
[% Units Market Share]-[% Units Market Share SPLY]
IF([Total VanArsdel Units R12M]=0, 0, DIVIDE([Total VanArsdel Units R12M], [Total Units R12Ms], 0))

IF(ISBLANK(CALCULATE([Sentiment], Manufacturer[MfgisVanArsdel]="No"))||ISBLANK(CALCULATE([Sentiment], Manufacturer[MfgisVanArsdel]="Yes")), BLANK(), CALCULATE([Sentiment], Manufacturer[MfgisVanArsdel]="No") - CALCULATE([Sentiment], Manufacturer[MfgisVanArsdel]="Yes"))
DIVIDE([Total Units YTD Var],[TOTAL UNITS SPLY])
